summary.span: 提供一些方法，用于创建、处理、搜索数组并对数组进行排序，从而充当公共语言运行时中所有数组的基类。

span.span: Provides methods for creating, manipulating, searching, and sorting arrays, thereby serving as the base class for all arrays in the common language runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 类不是 命名空间的一部分。The class is not part of the namespaces. 但是，它仍被视为集合，因为它基于 接口。However, it is still considered a collection because it is based on the interface. 类是支持数组的语言实现的基类。The class is the base class for language implementations that support arrays. 但是，只有系统和编译器才能显式从 类派生。However, only the system and compilers can derive explicitly from the class. 用户应使用该语言提供的数组构造。Users should employ the array constructs provided by the language. 元素是中的一个值 。An element is a value in an . 的长度 是它可以包含的元素总数。The length of an is the total number of elements it can contain. 的下限 是其第一个元素的索引。The lower bound of an is the index of its first element. 可以有任何下限，但默认情况下它的下限为零。An can have any lower bound, but it has a lower bound of zero by default. 使用创建类的实例时，可以定义其他下限 。A different lower bound can be defined when creating an instance of the class using . 多维 可以为每个维度提供不同的界限。A multidimensional can have different bounds for each dimension. 数组最多可以有32个维度。An array can have a maximum of 32 dimensions. 与命名空间中的类不同 ， 具有固定的容量。Unlike the classes in the namespaces, has a fixed capacity. 若要增加容量，必须创建 具有所需容量的新对象，将旧对象中的元素复制 到新对象，并删除旧对象 。To increase the capacity, you must create a new object with the required capacity, copy the elements from the old object to the new one, and delete the old . 数组大小限制为总计4000000000个元素，在任何给定 (维度中0X7FEFFFFF 的最大索引为字节数组的的最大索引和单字节结构的数组) 。The array size is limited to a total of 4 billion elements, and to a maximum index of 0X7FEFFFFF in any given dimension (0X7FFFFFC7 for byte arrays and arrays of single-byte structures). **仅 .NET Framework：** 默认情况下，的最大大小 为 2 gb (gb) 。**.NET Framework only:** By default, the maximum size of an is 2 gigabytes (GB). 在64位环境中，可以通过 `enabled` [](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element) `true` 在运行时环境中将 gcAllowVeryLargeObjects 配置元素的属性设置为来避免大小限制。In a 64-bit environment, you can avoid the size restriction by setting the `enabled` attribute of the [gcAllowVeryLargeObjects](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element) configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. 一维数组实现 、 、 和 泛型接口。Single-dimensional arrays implement the , , , and generic interfaces. 实现在运行时提供给数组，因此，泛型接口不会出现在类的声明语法中 。The implementations are provided to arrays at run time, and as a result, the generic interfaces do not appear in the declaration syntax for the class. 此外，没有可通过将数组强制转换为泛型接口类型 (的接口成员的引用主题) 的显式接口实现。In addition, there are no reference topics for interface members that are accessible only by casting an array to the generic interface type (explicit interface implementations). 将数组强制转换为这些接口之一时要注意的关键一点是，添加、插入或删除元素的成员会引发 。The key thing to be aware of when you cast an array to one of these interfaces is that members which add, insert, or remove elements throw . 对象提供有关数组类型声明的信息。 objects provide information about array type declarations. 具有相同数组类型的对象共享相同的 对象。 objects with the same array type share the same object. 和 可能不会返回所需的结果， 因为如果数组强制转换为类型 ，则结果是对象，而不是数组。 and might not return the expected results with because if an array is cast to the type , the result is an object, not an array. 即， `typeof(System.Array).IsArray` 返回 `false` ，并 `typeof(System.Array).GetElementType` 返回 `null` 。That is, `typeof(System.Array).IsArray` returns `false`, and `typeof(System.Array).GetElementType` returns `null`. 方法不仅复制同一类型的数组中的元素，还复制不同类型的标准数组之间的元素; 它会自动处理类型强制转换。The method copies elements not only between arrays of the same type but also between standard arrays of different types; it handles type casting automatically. 某些方法（如 、、 、 和 ）提供接受64位整数作为参数以容纳大容量数组的重载。Some methods, such as , , , , and , provide overloads that accept 64-bit integers as parameters to accommodate large capacity arrays. 和 返回64位整数，指示数组的长度。 and return 64-bit integers indicating the length of the array. 不保证会对进行 排序。The is not guaranteed to be sorted. 必须对 执行操作之前进行排序 (如 需要 对进行排序) 。You must sort the prior to performing operations (such as ) that require the to be sorted. 使用 本机代码中的指针对象不受支持，并将 为多个方法引发。Using an object of pointers in native code is not supported and will throw a for several methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 复制类型为 integer 的数组和类型为的数组之间的元素 。The following code example shows how copies elements between an array of type integer and an array of type . :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/CPP/source.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/CS/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/VB/source.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 下面的代码示例创建并初始化 并显示其属性和元素。The following code example creates and initializes an and displays its properties and its elements. [!code-cpp[Classic Array Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/CPP/source3.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp-interactive[Classic Array Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/CS/source3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Array Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/VB/source3.vb#2)]

threadsafe.span: 此类型) 成员 Visual Basic 的公共静态 (是线程安全的。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不为提供同步 (线程安全) 包装器 ; 但是，基于的 .net 类 使用属性提供其自己的同步版本 。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for an ; however, .NET classes based on provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

returns.span: 指定数组的只读 包装。

span.span: A read-only wrapper for the specified array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止对数组进行任何修改，只需要通过此包装公开数组。To prevent any modifications to the array, expose the array only through this wrapper. 只读集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例将数组包装为只读 。The following example wraps an array in a read-only . [!code-cpp[System.Array.AsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.AsReadOnly/CPP/arrayasreadonly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.AsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.AsReadOnly/CS/arrayasreadonly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.AsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.AsReadOnly/VB/arrayasreadonly.vb#1)]

returns.span: 如果找到 ，则为指定 中的指定 的索引；否则为负数。

returns.span: 如果找不到 且 小于 中的一个或多个元素，则返回的负数是大于 的第一个元素的索引的按位求补。

span.span: If is not found and is less than one or more elements in , the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the first element that is larger than .

returns.span: 如果找不到 且 大于 中的所有元素，则返回的负数是（最后一个元素的索引加 1）的按位求补。

span.span: If is not found and is greater than all elements in , the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of (the index of the last element plus 1).

span.span: If this method is called with a non-sorted , the return value can be incorrect and a negative number could be returned, even if is present in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不支持搜索包含负索引的数组。This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes. `array` 在调用此方法之前必须进行排序。`array` must be sorted before calling this method. 如果不 包含指定的值，则该方法返回一个负整数。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以在 c # 中将按位求补运算符 (~ （ `Not` Visual Basic) 到负结果以生成索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index. 如果此索引大于数组的上限，则数组中没有大于的元素 `value` 。If this index is one greater than the upper bound of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array. 否则，它是大于的第一个元素的索引 `value` 。Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`. `value`或的每个元素都 `array` 必须实现 接口，该接口用于比较。Either `value` or every element of `array` must implement the interface, which is used for comparisons. 的元素 `array` 必须已根据实现定义的排序顺序按递增值排序 ; 否则，结果可能不正确。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `value` 未实现 接口，则在 `array` 搜索开始之前，不会对的元素进行测试 。If`value` does not implement the interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for before the search begins. 如果搜索遇到不实现的元素，则会引发异常 。An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement . 允许重复元素。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果 包含多个等于 `value` 的元素，则此方法只返回其中一个匹配项的索引，而不是第一个匹配项的索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 始终可以与任何其他引用类型进行比较;因此，与的比较 `null` 不会生成异常。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 对于测试的每个元素， `value` 都将传递到适当的 实现，即使 `value` 是 `null` 。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 也就是说，该 实现确定给定元素如何与进行比较 `null` 。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 此方法是一个 O (日志 `n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 的 `array` 。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在中查找特定的对象 。The following code example shows how to use to locate a specific object in an . > [!NOTE] > 创建数组时，其元素采用升序排序顺序。The array is created with its elements in ascending sort order. 方法要求数组按升序排序。The method requires the array to be sorted in ascending order. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.BinarySearch Example/CPP/source.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.BinarySearch Example/CS/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.BinarySearch Example/VB/source.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不支持搜索包含负索引的数组。This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes. `array` 在调用此方法之前必须进行排序。`array` must be sorted before calling this method. 如果不 包含指定的值，则该方法返回一个负整数。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以在 c # 中将按位求补运算符 (~ （ `Not` Visual Basic) 到负结果以生成索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index. 如果此索引大于数组的上限，则数组中没有大于的元素 `value` 。If this index is one greater than the upper bound of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array. 否则，它是大于的第一个元素的索引 `value` 。Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`. 比较器自定义元素的比较方式。The comparer customizes how the elements are compared. 例如，可以将 用作比较器来执行不区分大小写的字符串搜索。For example, you can use a as the comparer to perform case-insensitive string searches. 如果不 `comparer` 为 `null` ，则使用指定的实现将的元素 `array` 与指定的值进行比较 。If `comparer` is not `null`, the elements of `array` are compared to the specified value using the specified implementation. 的元素 `array` 必须已根据定义的排序顺序按递增的值排序 `comparer` ; 否则，结果可能不正确。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by `comparer`; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 如果 `comparer` 为 `null` ，则使用 由元素本身或指定的值提供的实现进行比较。If`comparer` is `null`, the comparison is done using the implementation provided by the element itself or by the specified value. 的元素 `array` 必须已根据实现定义的排序顺序按递增值排序 ; 否则，结果可能不正确。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `comparer` 为 `null` 且 `value` 未实现 接口，则在 `array` 搜索开始之前，不会对的元素进行测试 。If `comparer` is `null` and `value` does not implement the interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for before the search begins. 如果搜索遇到不实现的元素，则会引发异常 。An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement . 允许重复元素。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果 包含多个等于 `value` 的元素，则此方法只返回其中一个匹配项的索引，而不是第一个匹配项的索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 始终可以与任何其他引用类型进行比较;因此，与的比较 `null` 不会生成异常。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 对于测试的每个元素， `value` 都将传递到适当的 实现，即使 `value` 是 `null` 。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 也就是说，该 实现确定给定元素如何与进行比较 `null` 。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 此方法是一个 O (日志 `n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 的 `array` 。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`.

summary.span: 使用由一维排序数组中每个元素和指定的值实现的 接口，在该数组的一个元素范围内搜索值。

span.span: Searches a range of elements in a one-dimensional sorted array for a value, using the interface implemented by each element of the array and by the specified value.

returns.span: 如果找到 ，则为指定 中的指定 的索引；否则为负数。

span.span: The index of the specified in the specified , if is found; otherwise, a negative number.

returns.span: 如果找不到 且 小于 中的一个或多个元素，则返回的负数是大于 的第一个元素的索引的按位求补。

span.span: If is not found and is less than one or more elements in , the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the first element that is larger than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不支持搜索包含负索引的数组。This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes. `array` 在调用此方法之前必须进行排序。`array` must be sorted before calling this method. 如果不 包含指定的值，则该方法返回一个负整数。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以在 c # 中将按位求补运算符 (~ （ `Not` Visual Basic) 到负结果以生成索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index. 如果此索引大于数组的上限，则数组中没有大于的元素 `value` 。If this index is one greater than the upper bound of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array. 否则，它是大于的第一个元素的索引 `value` 。Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`. `value`或的每个元素都 `array` 必须实现 接口，该接口用于比较。Either `value` or every element of `array` must implement the interface, which is used for comparisons. 的元素 `array` 必须已根据实现定义的排序顺序按递增值排序 ; 否则，结果可能不正确。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `value` 未实现 接口，则在 `array` 搜索开始之前，不会对的元素进行测试 。If `value` does not implement the interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for before the search begins. 如果搜索遇到不实现的元素，则会引发异常 。An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement . 允许重复元素。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果 包含多个等于 `value` 的元素，则此方法只返回其中一个匹配项的索引，而不是第一个匹配项的索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 始终可以与任何其他引用类型进行比较;因此，与的比较 `null` 不会生成异常。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 对于测试的每个元素， `value` 都将传递到适当的 实现，即使 `value` 是 `null` 。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 也就是说，该 实现确定给定元素如何与进行比较 `null` 。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 此方法是一个 O (日志 `n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 `length` 。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

否则，结果可能不正确。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 允许重复元素。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果 包含多个等于 `value` 的元素，则此方法只返回其中一个匹配项的索引，而不是第一个匹配项的索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 始终可以与任何其他引用类型进行比较;因此，与的比较 `null` 不会生成异常。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 对于测试的每个元素， `value` 都将传递到适当的 实现，即使 `value` 是 `null` 。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 也就是说，该 实现确定给定元素如何与进行比较 `null` 。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 此方法是一个 O (日志 `n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 的 `array` 。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 泛型方法重载和 泛型方法重载。The following code example demonstrates the generic method overload and the generic method overload. 创建一个字符串数组，无特定顺序。An array of strings is created, in no particular order. 显示、排序并再次显示数组。The array is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. 若要使用方法，必须对数组进行排序 。Arrays must be sorted in order to use the method. > [!NOTE] > 对 和泛型方法的调用与对 其非泛型方法的调用没有任何不同之处，因为 Visual Basic、c # 和 c + + 从第一个参数的类型推断泛型类型参数的类型。The calls to the and generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument. 如果使用 [Ildasm.exe (IL 拆装器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler) 检查 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) ，则可以看到调用了泛型方法。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. 然后，使用泛型方法重载搜索两个字符串，一个字符串不在数组中，另一个是。The generic method overload is then used to search for two strings, one that is not in the array and one that is. 此方法的数组和返回值 将传递给 `ShowWhere` 泛型方法，该方法显示索引值（如果找到该字符串），否则为搜索字符串在数组中所处的元素。The array and the return value of the method are passed to the `ShowWhere` generic method, which displays the index value if the string is found, and otherwise the elements the search string would fall between if it were in the array. 如果字符串不在数组中，则该索引为负; 因此，该 `ShowWhere` 方法采用 c Visual C++ # 中的 ~ 运算符 (按位求补， `Xor` 在 Visual Basic) 中使用-1，以获取列表中大于搜索字符串的第一个元素的索引。The index is negative if the string is not in the array, so the `ShowWhere` method takes the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor`-1 in Visual Basic) to obtain the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortSearch/cpp/source.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortSearch/cs/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortSearch/vb/source.vb" id="Snippet1":::

increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `comparer` 为， `null` 并且不 `value` 实现 泛型接口，则在 `array` 搜索开始之前，不会测试的元素。If `comparer` is `null` and `value` does not implement the generic interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for before the search begins. 如果搜索遇到不实现的元素，则会引发异常 。An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement . 允许重复元素。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果 包含多个等于 `value` 的元素，则此方法只返回其中一个匹配项的索引，而不是第一个匹配项的索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 始终可以与任何其他引用类型进行比较;因此，与的比较 `null` 不会生成异常。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 对于测试的每个元素， `value` 都将传递到适当的 实现，即使 `value` 是 `null` 。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 也就是说，该 实现确定给定元素如何与进行比较 `null` 。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 此方法是一个 O (日志 `n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 的 `array` 。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 泛型方法重载和 泛型方法重载。The following example demonstrates the generic method overload and the generic method overload. 此代码示例定义了一个名为的字符串的替代比较器，该比较器 `ReverseCompare` `IComparer` `IComparer(Of String)` `IComparer` 在 Visual C++) 泛型接口中实现 Visual Basic 中的 (。The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比较器调用 方法，并反转比较数的顺序，以便字符串排序为高到低而不是低到高。The comparer calls the method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high. 显示、排序并再次显示数组。The array is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. 若要使用方法，必须对数组进行排序 。Arrays must be sorted in order to use the method. > [!NOTE] > 对 和泛型方法的调用与对 其非泛型方法的调用没有任何不同之处，因为 Visual Basic、c # 和 c + + 从第一个参数的类型推断泛型类型参数的类型。The calls to the and generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument. 如果使用 [Ildasm.exe (IL 拆装器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler) 检查 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) ，则可以看到调用了泛型方法。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. 然后，使用泛型方法重载搜索两个字符串，一个字符串不在数组中，另一个是。The generic method overload is then used to search for two strings, one that is not in the array and one that is. 此方法的数组和返回值 将传递给 `ShowWhere` 泛型方法，该方法显示索引值（如果找到该字符串），否则为搜索字符串在数组中所处的元素。The array and the return value of the method are passed to the `ShowWhere` generic method, which displays the index value if the string is found, and otherwise the elements the search string would fall between if it were in the array. 如果字符串不是 n 数组，则该索引为负; 因此，该 `ShowWhere` 方法采用 c Visual C++ # 中的 ~ 运算符 (按位求补， `Xor` 在 Visual Basic) 中使用-1，以获取列表中大于搜索字符串的第一个元素的索引。The index is negative if the string is not n the array, so the `ShowWhere` method takes the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) to obtain the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string. :::code language="cpp" remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不支持搜索包含负索引的数组。This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes. `array` 在调用此方法之前必须进行排序。`array` must be sorted before calling this method. 如果数组不包含指定的值，则该方法返回一个负整数。If the array does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以在 c # 中将按位求补运算符 (~ （ `Not` Visual Basic) 到负结果以生成索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index. 如果此索引等于数组的大小，则数组中没有大于的元素 `value` 。If this index is equal to the size of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array. 否则，它是大于的第一个元素的索引 `value` 。Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`. `T` 必须实现 用于比较的泛型接口。`T` must implement the generic interface, which is used for comparisons. 的元素 `array` 必须已根据实现定义的排序顺序按递增值排序 ; 否则，结果可能不正确。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 允许重复元素。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果 包含多个等于 `value` 的元素，则此方法只返回其中一个匹配项的索引，而不是第一个匹配项的索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 始终可以与任何其他引用类型进行比较;因此，与的比较 `null` 不会生成异常。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 对于测试的每个元素， `value` 都将传递到适当的 实现，即使 `value` 是 `null` 。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 也就是说，该 实现确定给定元素如何与进行比较 `null` 。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 此方法是一个 O (日志 `n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 `length` 。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将数组中的每个元素重置为元素类型的默认值。This method resets each element in an array to the element type's default value. 它将引用类型的元素设置 (包括 ) 到的元素 `null` ，并将值类型的元素设置为下表中显示的默认值。It sets elements of reference types (including elements) to `null`, and sets elements of value types to the default values shown in the following table. |类型Type|值Value| |----------|-----------| ||`false`| |所有整型和浮点型数值类型All integral and floating point numeric types|0（零）0 (zero)| ||| |其他值类型Other value types|类型字段的默认值Default value of the type's fields| 已清除元素的范围在多维数组的行与行之间进行换行。The range of cleared elements wrap from row to row in a multi-dimensional array. 此方法仅清除元素的值;它不会删除元素本身。This method only clears the values of the elements; it does not delete the elements themselves. 数组具有固定的大小;因此，无法添加或删除元素。An array has a fixed size; therefore, elements cannot be added or removed. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 `length` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法来重置一维二维数组中的整数值。The following example uses the method to reset integer values in a one-dimensional, two-dimensional, and three-dimensional array. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clear/cs/example.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clear/vb/example.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 下面的示例定义了一个 `TimeZoneTime` 包含 字段和字段的结构 。The following example defines a `TimeZoneTime` structure that includes a field and a field. 然后，它调用 方法以清除两元素值数组中的一个元素 `TimeZoneTime` 。It then calls the method to clear one element in a two-element array of `TimeZoneTime` values. 方法将已清除元素的值设置为对象的默认值，即 ，对象的默认值为 `null` 。The method sets the value of the cleared element to the default value of a object, which is `null`, and the default value of a object, which is . remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅复制的 元素 （无论它们是引用类型还是值类型），而不复制引用引用的对象。A shallow copy of an copies only the elements of the , whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to. 新点中对与 原始点中的引用相同的对象的引用 。The references in the new point to the same objects that the references in the original point to. 相反，的深层副本会复制元素 以及元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of an copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 克隆与原始副本相同 。The clone is of the same as the original . 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例克隆一个 数组，并演示浅表副本的行为。The following code example clones a array and demonstrates the behavior of a shallow copy. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clone/CPP/arrayclone.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clone/CS/arrayclone.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clone/VB/arrayclone.vb" id="Snippet1":::

span.span: Guarantees that all changes are undone if the copy does not succeed completely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sourceArray`和 `destinationArray` 参数必须具有相同的维数。The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions. 该 `sourceArray` 类型必须与类型相同或派生 `destinationArray` ，否则 将引发。The `sourceArray` type must be the same as or derived from the `destinationArray` type; otherwise, an is thrown. 与不同 ，在 执行任何操作之前，验证数组类型的兼容性。Unlike , verifies the compatibility of the array types before performing any operation. 当在多维数组之间复制时，数组的行为类似于一维数组，其中的行 (或列) 在概念上是端到端的布局。When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end-to-end. 例如，如果数组有三行 (或列) 每个元素有四个元素，则从数组的开头复制六个元素将复制第一行 (或列) 的所有四个元素，并将第二行 (或) 列的前两个元素。For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column). 若要开始从第三行 (或列) 的第二个元素复制， `sourceIndex` 必须是第一行 (或列) 加上第二行 (或列的长度) 加两行。To start copying from the second element of the third row (or column), `sourceIndex` must be the upper bound of the first row (or column) plus the length of the second row (or column) plus two. 如果 `sourceArray` 和 `destinationArray` 重叠，此方法的行为就像在覆盖之前将的原始值 `sourceArray` 保留在临时位置 `destinationArray` 。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten. [C++][C++] 此方法等效于标准 C/c + + 函数 `memmove` ，而不是 `memcpy` 。This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`. 数组可以是引用类型的数组或值类型数组。The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays. 如果 `sourceArray` 和 `destinationArray` 既是引用类型数组，或是同时为类型的数组 ，则执行浅表复制。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type , a shallow copy is performed. 的浅表副本 是新的， 其中包含对与原始元素相同的元素的引用 。A shallow copy of an is a new containing references to the same elements as the original . 不复制元素本身或元素所引用的任何内容。The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied. 相反，的深层副本会复制元素 以及元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of an copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 如果此方法在复制时引发异常，则将 `destinationArray` 保持不变; 因此， 可以在受约束的执行区域内 () 使用。If this method throws an exception while copying, the `destinationArray` remains unchanged; therefore, can be used within a constrained execution region (). 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 `length` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个方法委托，该委托将对象转换为目标类型。The is a delegate to a method that converts an object to the target type. 的元素 `array` 分别传递到 ，并将转换后的元素保存到新数组中。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , and the converted elements are saved in the new array. 源 `array` 保持不变。The source `array` remains unchanged. 此方法是一个 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 的 `array` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了一个名为 `PointFToPoint` 的方法，该方法将 结构转换为 结构。The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a structure to a structure. 然后，该示例创建一个 结构数组， `Converter` `Converter(Of PointF, Point)` 在 Visual Basic) 中创建委托 (来表示 `PointFToPoint` 方法，并将委托传递给 方法。The example then creates an array of structures, creates a `Converter` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the method. 方法将输入列表的每个元素传递给 `PointFToPoint` 方法，并将转换后的元素放入新的 结构列表。The method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of structures. 将显示这两个列表。Both lists are displayed. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cpp/source.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cs/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/vb/source.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sourceArray`和 `destinationArray` 参数必须具有相同的维数。The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions. 此外，必须已设置了 `destinationArray` 维度，并且必须具有足够数量的元素来容纳所复制的数据。In addition, `destinationArray` must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied data. 当在多维数组之间复制时，数组的行为类似于一维数组，在这种情况下，) (或列的行在概念上是端到端。When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end to end. 例如，如果数组有三行 (或列) 每个元素有四个元素，则从数组的开头复制六个元素将复制第一行 (或列) 的所有四个元素，并将第二行 (或) 列的前两个元素。For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column). 如果 `sourceArray` 和 `destinationArray` 重叠，此方法的行为就像在覆盖之前将的原始值 `sourceArray` 保留在临时位置 `destinationArray` 。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten. [C++][C++] 此方法等效于标准 C/c + + 函数 `memmove` ，而不是 `memcpy` 。This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`. 数组可以是引用类型的数组或值类型数组。The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays. 根据需要执行类型 downcasting。Type downcasting is performed, as required. - 从引用类型数组复制到值类型数组时，每个元素都将取消装箱，然后复制。When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied. 从值类型的数组复制到引用类型的数组时，每个元素都进行装箱，然后复制。When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied. - 在从引用类型或值类型的数组复制到 数组时， 将创建来保存每个值或引用，然后复制。When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an array, an is created to hold each value or reference and then copied. 从 数组复制到引用类型或值类型的数组时，如果不可能进行赋值，则 会引发。When copying from an array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an is thrown. - 如果 `sourceArray` 和 `destinationArray` 既是引用类型数组，或是同时为类型的数组 ，则执行浅表复制。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type , a shallow copy is performed. 的浅表副本 是新的， 其中包含对与原始元素相同的元素的引用 。A shallow copy of an is a new containing references to the same elements as the original . 不复制元素本身或元素所引用的任何内容。The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied. 相反，的深层副本会复制元素 以及元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of an copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 如果数组的类型不兼容，则会引发。An is thrown if the arrays are of incompatible types. 类型兼容性定义如下：Type compatibility is defined as follows: - 类型与自身兼容。A type is compatible with itself. - 值类型与和兼容， 具有由该值类型实现的接口类型。A value type is compatible with and with an interface type implemented by that value type. 仅当某个值类型直接实现该接口时，才会将该值类型视为已连接。A value type is considered connected to an interface only if it implements that interface directly. 断开连接的类型不兼容。Disconnected types are not compatible. - 如果从源类型到目标类型的复制是扩大转换，则两个内部 (预定义) 值类型都是兼容的。Two intrinsic (predefined) value types are compatible if copying from the source type to the destination type is a widening conversion. 扩大转换从不会丢失信息，而收缩转换可能会丢失信息。A widening conversion never loses information, whereas a narrowing conversion can lose information. 例如，将32位有符号整数转换为64位有符号整数是扩大转换，将64位有符号整数转换为32位带符号整数是收缩转换。For example, converting a 32-bit signed integer to a 64-bit signed integer is a widening conversion, and converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer is a narrowing conversion. 有关转换的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about conversions, see . - Nonintrinsic (用户定义的) 值类型仅与自身兼容。A nonintrinsic (user-defined) value type is compatible only with itself. - 枚举具有到及其基础类型的隐式转换 。Enumerations have an implicit conversion to and to their underlying type. 如果中的每个元素都 `sourceArray` 需要向下转换 (例如，从基类到派生类或从接口到对象) 并且不能将一个或多个元素强制转换为中的相应类型 `destinationArray` ， 则会引发。If every element in `sourceArray` requires a downcast (for example, from a base class to a derived class or from an interface to an object) and one or more elements cannot be cast to the corresponding type in `destinationArray`, an is thrown. 如果此方法在复制时引发异常，则的状态 `destinationArray` 为 undefined。If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `destinationArray` is undefined. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 `length` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sourceArray`和 `destinationArray` 参数必须具有相同的维数。The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions. 此外，必须已设置了 `destinationArray` 维度，并且必须具有足够数量的元素， `destinationIndex` 才能容纳复制的数据。In addition, `destinationArray` must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements starting from the `destinationIndex` position to accommodate the copied data. 当在多维数组之间复制时，数组的行为类似于一维数组，其中的行 (或列) 在概念上是端到端的布局。When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end-to-end. 例如，如果数组有三行 (或列) 每个元素有四个元素，则从数组的开头复制六个元素将复制第一行 (或列) 的所有四个元素，并将第二行 (或) 列的前两个元素。For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column). 若要开始从第三行 (或列) 的第二个元素复制， `sourceIndex` 必须是第一行 (或列) 加上第二行 (或列的长度) 加两行。To start copying from the second element of the third row (or column), `sourceIndex` must be the upper bound of the first row (or column) plus the length of the second row (or column) plus two. 如果 `sourceArray` 和 `destinationArray` 重叠，此方法的行为就像在覆盖之前将的原始值 `sourceArray` 保留在临时位置 `destinationArray` 。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten. [C++][C++] 此方法等效于标准 C/c + + 函数 `memmove` ，而不是 `memcpy` 。This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`. 数组可以是引用类型的数组或值类型数组。The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays. 根据需要执行类型 downcasting。Type downcasting is performed, as required. - 从引用类型数组复制到值类型数组时，每个元素都将取消装箱，然后复制。When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied. 从值类型的数组复制到引用类型的数组时，每个元素都进行装箱，然后复制。When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied. - 在从引用类型或值类型的数组复制到 数组时， 将创建来保存每个值或引用，然后复制。When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an array, an is created to hold each value or reference and then copied. 从 数组复制到引用类型或值类型的数组时，如果不可能进行赋值，则 会引发。When copying from an array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an is thrown. - 如果 `sourceArray` 和 `destinationArray` 既是引用类型数组，或是同时为类型的数组 ，则执行浅表复制。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type , a shallow copy is performed. 的浅表副本 是新的， 其中包含对与原始元素相同的元素的引用 。A shallow copy of an is a new containing references to the same elements as the original . 不复制元素本身或元素所引用的任何内容。The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied. 相反，的深层副本会复制元素 以及元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of an copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 如果数组的类型不兼容，则会引发。An is thrown if the arrays are of incompatible types. 类型兼容性定义如下：Type compatibility is defined as follows: - 类型与自身兼容。A type is compatible with itself. - 值类型与和兼容， 具有由该值类型实现的接口类型。A value type is compatible with and with an interface type implemented by that value type. 仅当某个值类型直接实现该接口时，才会将该值类型视为已连接。A value type is considered connected to an interface only if it implements that interface directly. 断开连接的类型不兼容。Disconnected types are not compatible. - 如果从源类型到目标类型的复制是扩大转换，则两个内部 (预定义) 值类型都是兼容的。Two intrinsic (predefined) value types are compatible if copying from the source type to the destination type is a widening conversion. 扩大转换从不会丢失信息，而收缩转换可能会丢失信息。A widening conversion never loses information, whereas a narrowing conversion can lose information. 例如，将32位有符号整数转换为64位有符号整数是扩大转换，将64位有符号整数转换为32位带符号整数是收缩转换。For example, converting a 32-bit signed integer to a 64-bit signed integer is a widening conversion, and converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer is a narrowing conversion. 有关转换的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about conversions, see . - Nonintrinsic (用户定义的) 值类型仅与自身兼容。A nonintrinsic (user-defined) value type is compatible only with itself. - 枚举具有到及其基础类型的隐式转换 。Enumerations have an implicit conversion to and to their underlying type. 如果中的每个元素都 `sourceArray` 需要向下转换 (例如，从基类到派生类或从接口到对象) 并且不能将一个或多个元素强制转换为中的相应类型 `destinationArray` ， 则会引发。If every element in `sourceArray` requires a downcast (for example, from a base class to a derived class or from an interface to an object) and one or more elements cannot be cast to the corresponding type in `destinationArray`, an is thrown. 如果此方法在复制时引发异常，则的状态 `destinationArray` 为 undefined。If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `destinationArray` is undefined. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 `length` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将复制 到另一个 。The following code example shows how to copy an to another . :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/CPP/source.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用非零下限将复制到另一个。The following code example shows how to copy an to another with a nonzero lower bound. 请注意，将复制整个源 ，包括覆盖目标中现有元素的空元素 。Note that the entire source is copied, including empty elements that overwrite existing elements in the target . :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/CPP/source2.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/CS/source2.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/VB/source2.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将当前数组实例的所有元素复制到 `array` 目标数组，从索引开始 `index` 。This method copies all the elements of the current array instance to the `array` destination array, starting at index `index`. `array`目标数组必须已设置了维度，并且必须具有足够数量的元素来容纳复制的元素。The `array` destination array must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied elements. 否则，该方法将引发异常。Otherwise, the method throws an exception. 此方法支持 接口。This method supports the interface. 如果 不显式需要实现，请使用 以避免额外的间接寻址。If implementing is not explicitly required, use to avoid an extra indirection. 如果此方法在复制时引发异常，则的状态 `array` 为 undefined。If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `array` is undefined. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 它仅执行浅表复制。It performs a shallow copy only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与大多数类不同， 提供 方法，而不是公共构造函数，以允许进行后期绑定访问。Unlike most classes, provides the method, instead of public constructors, to allow for late bound access. `lengths`和 `lowerBounds` 数组必须具有相同数量的元素。The `lengths` and `lowerBounds` arrays must have the same number of elements. 数组中的元素数 `lengths` 必须等于新中的维数 。The number of elements in the `lengths` array must equal the number of dimensions in the new . 数组中的每个元素 `lengths` 都必须在新中指定相应维度的长度 。Each element of the `lengths` array must specify the length of the corresponding dimension in the new . 数组中的每个元素 `lowerBounds` 都必须指定新中的相应维度的下限 。Each element of the `lowerBounds` array must specify the lower bound of the corresponding dimension in the new . 通常，.NET 类库和许多编程语言不会处理非零下限。Generally, the .NET class library and many programming languages do not handle non-zero lower bounds. 引用类型的元素将初始化为 `null` 。Reference-type elements are initialized to `null`. 值类型元素初始化为零。Value-type elements are initialized to zero. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是中所有值的乘积 `lengths` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the product of all values in `lengths`. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有语言都支持具有非零下限的数组，因此您可能无法基于 语言的数组类型强制转换非零的实例。Not all languages support arrays with non-zero lower bounds, and therefore you may not be able to cast instances of non-zero based to the language's array type. 例如，不能将具有下限6的1维整数数组转换为 c # 的 `int[]` 类型。For example, you cannot cast a 1-dimensional integer array with the lower bound 6 to C#'s `int[]` type. 这会导致 运行时出现消息 "无法将类型 ' system.object [] ' 的对象强制转换 \* 为类型 ' system.object [] '。"，其中星号 (\*) 表示不是从零开始的索引。This results in during runtime with the message "Unable to cast object of type 'System.Int32[\*]' to type 'System.Int32[]'.", where the asterisk (\*) means non-zero based index. 但是，你可以将通过创建的任何级别的零个数组转换 为该语言的数组。However, you can cast zero based arrays of any rank created with to the language's array. 例如，可以将使用此方法创建的二维整数数组转换为 c # 的 `int[,]` 类型。For example, you can cast a 2-dimensional zero based integer array created with this method to C#'s `int[,]` type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化 具有指定下限的多维。The following code example shows how to create and initialize a multidimensional with specified lower bounds. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CreateInstance4 Example/CPP/source.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CreateInstance4 Example/CS/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CreateInstance4 Example/CS/source.cs" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个方法委托， `true` 如果传递给它的对象与委托中定义的条件相匹配，则它将返回。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 的元素 `array` 分别传递到 ，当找到匹配项时将停止处理。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , and processing is stopped when a match is found. > [!NOTE] > 在 c # 和 Visual Basic 中，无需 显式创建委托。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the delegate explicitly. 这些语言从上下文推断正确的委托并自动创建它。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 此方法是一个 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 的 `array` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的示例 使用 lambda 表达式为方法指定匹配条件，以检查行星是否以给定的字母开头，或者是否在给定的数组中找到了行星。The following example specifies the match conditions for the method using lambda expressions to check whether a planet starts with a given letter or whether the planet is found on the given array. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/cs/exists3.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet3"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/vb/exists3.vb" id="Snippet3"::: 下面的示例使用 方法来指示字符串数组中的任何名称是否以指定字符开头。The following example uses the method to indicate whether any names in a string array begin with a specified character. 该示例通过将 `StringSearcher` 字符串传递到要搜索的类构造函数来实例化对象。The example instantiates a `StringSearcher` object by passing the string to search for to its class constructor. `StringSearcher.StartsWith`方法与委托具有相同的签名 。The `StringSearcher.StartsWith` method has same signature as the delegate. 调用方法时，会将数组的每个成员传递给委托，直到返回 `true` 或循环访问数组中的所有元素。When the method is called, each member of the array is passed to the delegate until it returns `true` or iterates all the elements in the array. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/cs/exists1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/vb/exists1.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 你还可以使用 lambda 表达式，而不是显式定义其签名与委托的签名对应的方法。You can also use a lambda expression rather than explicitly define a method whose signature corresponds to that of the delegate. 下面的示例将 `StringSearcher` 类及其方法替换 `StartsWith` 为 lambda 表达式。The following example replaces the `StringSearcher` class and its `StartsWith` method with a lambda expression. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/cs/exists2.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/vb/exists2.vb" id="Snippet2":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 如果传递给它的对象与委托或 lambda 表达式中定义的条件相匹配，则为方法的委托或 lambda 表达式。The is a delegate to a method or a lambda expression that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate or lambda expression. 的元素 `array` 分别传递到 ，从第一个元素开始，到最后一个元素结束。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , starting with the first element and ending with the last element. 找到匹配项时将停止处理。Processing is stopped when a match is found. 此方法是一个 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 的 `array` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的示例将 委托与 泛型方法一起使用以搜索 结构数组。The following example uses a delegate with the generic method to search an array of structures. `ProductGT10` `true` 如果 X 和 Y 字段的乘积大于100000，则委托表示的方法返回。The method the delegate represents, `ProductGT10`, returns `true` if the product of the X and Y fields is greater than 100,000. 方法为数组的每个元素调用委托，并返回满足测试条件的第一个点。The method calls the delegate for each element of the array, returning the first point that meets the test condition. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 和 c # 用户不必显式创建委托或指定泛型方法的类型参数。Visual Basic and C# users do not have to create the delegate explicitly or specify the type argument of the generic method. 编译器根据您提供的方法参数确定必要的类型。The compilers determine the necessary types from the method arguments you supply. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.find/cs/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.find/vb/source.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 可以使用 lambda 表达式，而不是使用必需的签名显式定义方法，实例化 委托并将委托传递给 方法。Rather than explicitly defining a method with the necessary signature, instantiating a delegate, and passing the delegate to the method, it is customary to use a lambda expression. 下面的示例与上一个示例相同，不同之处在于它使用 lambda 表达式作为 `match` 参数。The following example is identical to the previous one, except that it uses a lambda expression as the `match` argument. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.find/cs/lambda.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.find/vb/lambda.vb" id="Snippet2":::

`array` 分别传递到 ，并将与条件相匹配的元素保存在返回的数组中。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , and the elements that match the conditions are saved in the returned array. 此方法是一个 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 的 `array` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个50随机数数组，其中的值的范围介于0到1000之间。The following example creates an array of 50 random numbers with values that can range from 0 to 1,000. 然后，它 使用返回值范围为300到600的 lambda 表达式调用方法。It then calls the method with a lambda expression that returns the values that range from 300 to 600. 请注意，lambda 表达式被传递了一个名 `x` 为的参数; 这表示传递到的单个数组成员 。Note that the lambda expression is passed a parameter named `x`; this represents the individual array member that is passed to the . 另请注意，在 `lBound` `uBound` lambda 表达式中可访问本地和变量。Also note that the local `lBound` and `uBound` variables are accessible within the lambda expression. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.findall/cs/findall.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.findall/vb/findall.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 下面的代码示例演示了 、 和 泛型方法。The following code example demonstrates the , , and generic methods. 创建一个字符串数组，其中包含8个恐龙名称，其中两个名称 (在位置1，5) 以 "saurus" 结尾。An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 此代码示例还定义了一个名为的搜索谓词方法 `EndsWithSaurus` ，该方法接受一个字符串参数，并返回一个布尔值，指示输入字符串是否以 "saurus" 结尾。The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 泛型方法从开始处遍历数组，并将每个元素传递给 `EndsWithSaurus` 方法。The generic method traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 当 `EndsWithSaurus` 方法 `true` 为元素 "Amargasaurus" 返回时，搜索将停止。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element "Amargasaurus". > [!NOTE] > 在 c # 和 Visual Basic 中，无需 `Predicate` `Predicate(Of String)` 显式创建 Visual Basic) 中的委托 (。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 这些语言从上下文推断正确的委托并自动创建它。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 泛型方法用于从末尾向后搜索数组。The generic method is used to search the array backward from the end. 它在位置5找到元素 "Dilophosaurus"。It finds the element "Dilophosaurus" at position 5. 泛型方法用于返回数组，该数组包含以 "saurus" 结尾的所有元素。The generic method is used to return an array containing all the elements that end in "saurus". 显示元素。The elements are displayed. 此代码示例还演示了 和 泛型方法。The code example also demonstrates the and generic methods. :::code language="cpp" remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示泛型方法的所有三个重载 。The following code example demonstrates all three overloads of the generic method. 创建一个字符串数组，其中包含8个恐龙名称，其中两个名称 (在位置1，5) 以 "saurus" 结尾。An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 此代码示例还定义了一个名为的搜索谓词方法 `EndsWithSaurus` ，该方法接受一个字符串参数，并返回一个布尔值，指示输入字符串是否以 "saurus" 结尾。The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 方法重载从开始处遍历数组，并将每个元素传递给 `EndsWithSaurus` 方法。The method overload traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 当 `EndsWithSaurus` 方法 `true` 为位置1处的元素返回时，搜索将停止。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element at position 1. > [!NOTE] > 在 c # 和 Visual Basic 中，无需 `Predicate` `Predicate(Of String)` 显式创建 Visual Basic) 中的委托 (。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 这些语言从上下文推断正确的委托并自动创建它。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 方法重载用于从位置2开始搜索数组，并继续到数组末尾。The method overload is used to search the array beginning at position 2 and continuing to the end of the array. 它在位置5找到元素。It finds the element at position 5. 最后， 使用方法重载在从位置2开始的三个元素的范围内进行搜索。Finally, the method overload is used to search the range of three elements beginning at position 2. 它将返回-1，因为该范围中没有以 "saurus" 结尾的恐龙名称。It returns -1 because there are no dinosaur names in that range that end with "saurus". :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_FindIndex/cpp/source.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_FindIndex/cs/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_FindIndex/vb/source.vb" id="Snippet1":::

Examples 下面的代码示例演示泛型方法的所有三个重载 。The following code example demonstrates all three overloads of the generic method. 创建一个字符串数组，其中包含8个恐龙名称，其中两个名称 (在位置1，5) 以 "saurus" 结尾。An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 此代码示例还定义了一个名为的搜索谓词方法 `EndsWithSaurus` ，该方法接受一个字符串参数，并返回一个布尔值，指示输入字符串是否以 "saurus" 结尾。The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 方法重载从末尾开始向后遍历数组，并将每个元素传递给 `EndsWithSaurus` 方法。The method overload traverses the array backward from the end, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 当 `EndsWithSaurus` 方法为位置5的元素返回时，搜索将停止 `true` 。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element at position 5. > [!NOTE] > 在 c # 和 Visual Basic 中，无需 `Predicate` `Predicate(Of String)` 显式创建 Visual Basic) 中的委托 (。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 这些语言从上下文推断正确的委托并自动创建它。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 方法重载用于从位置4开始搜索数组，并向后移动到数组的开头。The method overload is used to search the array beginning at position 4 and continuing backward to the beginning of the array. 它在位置1找到元素。It finds the element at position 1. 最后， 使用方法重载搜索从位置4开始的三个元素的范围并向后 (即元素4、3和 2) 。Finally, the method overload is used to search the range of three elements beginning at position 4 and working backward (that is, elements 4, 3, and 2). 它将返回-1，因为该范围中没有以 "saurus" 结尾的恐龙名称。It returns -1 because there are no dinosaur names in that range that end with "saurus". remarks.format: ## Remarks C `foreach` + + 中的 c # 语言 (在 `for each` `For Each` Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回 `false` 。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用 返回 `false` ， 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 该枚举数不具有独占访问集合的权限；因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来列出数组的元素。The following code example shows how to use to list the elements of an array. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array_GetEnumerator/CPP/array_getenumerator.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array_GetEnumerator/CS/array_getenumerator.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array_GetEnumerator/VB/array_getenumerator.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetLowerBound(0)` 返回数组的第一个维的起始索引，并 `GetLowerBound(Rank - 1)` 返回数组的最后一个维的起始索引。`GetLowerBound(0)` returns the starting index of the first dimension of the array, and `GetLowerBound(Rank - 1)` returns the starting index of the last dimension of the array. 方法始终返回一个值，该值指示数组下限的索引（即使数组为空）。The method always returns a value that indicates the index of the lower bound of the array, even if the array is empty. 请注意，尽管 .NET 中的大多数数组都是从零开始的 (也就是说， 对于数组的每个维度，该方法都返回零) ，.net 支持不是从零开始的数组。Note that, although most arrays in .NET are zero-based (that is, the method returns zero for each dimension of an array), .NET does support arrays that are not zero-based. 此类数组可以用方法创建 ，也可以从非托管代码返回。Such arrays can be created with the method, and can also be returned from unmanaged code. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 和 方法来显示一维数组和二维数组的边界，并显示其数组元素的值。The following example uses the and methods to display the bounds of a one-dimensional and two-dimensional array and to display the values of their array elements. param.span: 要在 中查找的对象。

summary.span: 在一个一维数组中搜索指定对象，并返回其首个匹配项的索引。

span.span: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of its first occurrence in a one-dimensional array.

returns.span: 如果找到，则为 中 的第一个匹配项的索引；否则为该数组的下限减 1。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法搜索一维数组的所有元素 `value` 。This method searches all the elements of a one-dimensional array for `value`. 若要确定 `value` 中是否存在 `array` ，方法会通过调用每个元素的方法来执行相等比较， `Equals` 直到找到匹配项为止。To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling each element's `Equals` method until it finds a match. 这意味着，如果元素重写 方法，则将调用该重写。This means that if the element overrides the method, that override is called. 由于大多数数组的下限均为零，因此如果找不到，则此方法通常返回-1 `value` 。Because most arrays have a lower bound of zero, this method generally returns -1 if`value` isn't found. 在极少数情况下，数组的下限等于 (0x80000000) 并且 `value` 找不到，则此方法返回 (0x7fffffff) 。In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to (0x80000000) and `value` isn't found, this method returns (0x7FFFFFFF). 此方法是一个 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 的 `array` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 该示例调用方法的以下三种重载 来查找字符串数组中字符串的索引：The example calls the following three overloads of the method to find the index of a string in a string array: - ，用于确定字符串数组中字符串 "the" 的第一个匹配项。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array. - ，用于确定第四个字符串中的第一个匹配项到字符串数组的最后一个元素。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in the fourth to the last elements of a string array. - ，用于确定字符串数组中字符串 "the" 的第一个匹配项，该字符串是从最后一个成功匹配的元素到数组末尾的下一个元素。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array from the element that follows the last successful match to the end of the array. [!code-cpp[Classic Array.IndexOf Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.IndexOf Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp-interactive[Classic Array.IndexOf Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.IndexOf Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Array.IndexOf Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.IndexOf Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .
is multidimensional.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法搜索从索引处的元素到最后一个元素的一维数组 `startIndex` 。This method searches a one-dimensional array from the element at index `startIndex` to the last element. 若要确定 `value` 中是否存在 `array` ，方法会通过调用 `Equals` 每个元素的方法来执行相等比较，直到找到匹配项为止。To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling the `Equals` method of every element until it finds a match. 这意味着，如果元素重写 方法，则将调用该重写。This means that if the element overrides the method, that override is called. 由于大多数数组的下限均为零，因此如果找不到，则此方法通常返回-1 `value` 。Because most arrays have a lower bound of zero, this method generally returns -1 if `value` isn't found. 在极少数情况下，数组的下限等于 (0x80000000) 并且 `value` 找不到，则此方法返回 (0x7fffffff) 。In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to (0x80000000) and `value` isn't found, this method returns (0x7FFFFFFF). 如果 `startIndex` 等于 ，则此方法返回-1。If `startIndex` equals ,the method returns -1. 如果 `startIndex` 大于 ，则方法将引发 。If `startIndex` is greater than , the method throws an . 此方法是一个 O (`n`) 操作，其中， `n` 是从到末尾的元素数 `startIndex` `array` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from `startIndex` to the end of `array`. ## Examples 该示例调用方法的以下三种重载 来查找字符串数组中字符串的索引：The example calls the following three overloads of the method to find the index of a string in a string array: - ，用于确定字符串数组中字符串 "the" 的第一个匹配项。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array. - ，用于确定第四个字符串中的第一个匹配项到字符串数组的最后一个元素。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in the fourth to the last elements of a string array. - ，用于确定字符串数组中字符串 "the" 的第一个匹配项，该字符串是从最后一个成功匹配的元素到数组末尾的下一个元素。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array from the element that follows the last successful match to the end of the array. summary.span: 在一个一维数组中搜索指定对象，并返回其首个匹配项的索引。

span.span: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of its first occurrence in a one-dimensional array.

returns.span: 如果在整个 中找到 的第一个匹配项，则为该项的从零开始的索引；否则为 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of in the entire , if found; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法搜索一维数组的所有元素 `value` 。This method searches all the elements of a one-dimensional array for `value`. 若要确定 `value` 中是否存在 `array` ，方法通过 `T.Equals` 对每个元素调用方法来执行相等比较。To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling the `T.Equals` method on every element. 这意味着，如果 `T` 重写 方法，则将调用该重写。This means that if `T` overrides the method, that override is called. 此方法是一个 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 的 `array` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法的所有三个泛型重载 。The following example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the method. 创建一个字符串数组，其中有一个条目出现在索引位置0和索引位置5。An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5. 方法重载从开始处搜索数组，并查找字符串的第一个匹配项。The method overload searches the array from the beginning, and finds the first occurrence of the string. 方法重载用于从索引位置3开始搜索数组，并继续到数组末尾，并查找字符串的第二个匹配项。The method overload is used to search the array beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the end of the array, and finds the second occurrence of the string. 最后， 使用方法重载搜索两个条目的范围（从第二个索引位置开始）; 它返回-1，因为该范围中没有搜索字符串的实例。Finally, the method overload is used to search a range of two entries, beginning at index location two; it returns -1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法旨在帮助编译器支持值类型数组;大多数用户不需要此方法。This method is designed to help compilers support value-type arrays; most users do not need this method. 不能对引用类型数组使用。It must not be used on reference-type arrays. 如果不是 值类型 或值类型没有无参数构造函数，则 不会修改。If the is not a value-type or if the value type does not have a parameterless constructor, the is not modified. 值类型 可以有任何下限和任意数量的维度。The value-type can have any lower bound and any number of dimensions. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . > [!CAUTION] > 只能对具有构造函数的值类型使用此方法;但是，c # 的本机值类型没有构造函数。You can use this method only on value types that have constructors; however, value types that are native to C# do not have constructors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 属性，因为它是接口所必需的 。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 在创建数组后，具有固定大小的数组不允许添加或删除元素，但允许修改现有元素。An array with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the array is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 属性，因为它是接口所必需的 。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 如果数组为只读，则在创建数组后，不允许添加、移除或修改元素。An array that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the array is created. 如果需要只读集合，请使用 实现接口的类 。If you require a read-only collection, use a class that implements the interface. 如果将数组强制转换或转换为 接口对象，则该 属性返回 `false` 。If you cast or convert an array to an interface object, the property returns `false`. 但是，如果将数组强制转换或转换为 接口，该 `IsReadOnly` 属性将返回 `true` 。However, if you cast or convert an array to a interface, the `IsReadOnly` property returns `true`. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 对于所有数组，此属性始终为 。

span.span: This property is always for all arrays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 属性，因为它是接口所必需的 。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 基于的 .NET 类 使用属性提供自己的集合的同步版本 。.NET classes based on provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property. 使用数组的类也可以使用属性来实现自己的同步 。Classes that use arrays can also implement their own synchronization using the property. 同步代码必须对 `SyncRoot` 集合的（而不是直接在集合上）执行操作。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the `SyncRoot` of the collection, not directly on the collection. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改集合的其他线程保持正确的同步。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection. 请注意，的某些实现 可能会返回 自身。Note that some implementations of might return the itself. 枚举集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性在整个枚举过程中锁定数组 。The following code example shows how to lock an array during the entire enumeration by using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 从最后一个元素开始向后搜索一维，并在第一个元素处结束。The one-dimensional is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element. 使用方法将元素与指定的值进行比较 。The elements are compared to the specified value using the method. 如果元素类型是用户定义的) 类型的 nonintrinsic (，则 `Equals` 使用该类型的实现。If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used. 由于大多数数组的下限均为零，因此当找不到时，此方法将返回-1 `value` 。Since most arrays will have a lower bound of zero, this method would generally return -1 when `value` is not found. 在极少数情况下，数组的下限等于 并且 `value` 找不到，此方法返回 `System.Int32.MinValue - 1` 。In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to and `value` is not found, this method returns , which is `System.Int32.MinValue - 1`. 此方法是一个 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 的 `array` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. 在 .NET Framework 2.0 及更高版本中，此方法使用的 和 方法 来确定 参数指定的是否 `value` 存在。In .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions, this method uses the and methods of the to determine whether the specified by the `value` parameter exists. 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中，此决定是使用自身的 和 方法进行的 `value` 。In earlier versions of .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `value` itself. `item`集合中的对象的参数方法。 methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定指定元素在数组中的最后一个匹配项的索引。The following code example shows how to determine the index of the last occurrence of a specified element in an array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 向后搜索从最后一个元素开始，到第一个元素结束。The is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element. 使用方法将元素与指定的值进行比较 。The elements are compared to the specified value using the method. 如果元素类型是用户定义的) 类型的 nonintrinsic (，则 `Equals` 使用该类型的实现。If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used. 此方法是一个 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 的 `array` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的所有三个泛型重载 。The following code example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the method. 创建一个字符串数组，其中有一个条目出现在索引位置0和索引位置5。An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5. 方法重载从末尾搜索整个数组，并查找字符串的第二个匹配项。The method overload searches the entire array from the end, and finds the second occurrence of the string. 方法重载用于从索引位置3开始向后搜索数组，并继续到数组的开头，并查找字符串的第一个匹配项。The method overload is used to search the array backward beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the beginning of the array, and finds the first occurrence of the string. 最后， 方法重载用于搜索由四个条目组成的范围，从索引位置4开始，扩展向后 (，也就是说，它在位置4、3、2和 1) 搜索项; 此搜索将返回-1，因为该范围中没有搜索字符串的实例。Finally, the method overload is used to search a range of four entries, beginning at index location 4 and extending backward (that is, it searches the items at locations 4, 3, 2, and 1); this search returns -1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range. param.name: count

summary.span: 搜索指定的对象，并返回 中包含指定数目元素并在指定索引处结尾的元素范围内的最后一个匹配项的索引。

span.span: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the last occurrence within the range of elements in the that contains the specified number of elements and ends at the specified index.

returns.span: 如果在 中找到了包含 中指定元素数并且到 结尾的元素范围内的 的最后一个匹配项的从零开始的索引，则为该索引；否则为 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index of the last occurrence of within the range of elements in that contains the number of elements specified in and ends at , if found; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `startIndex` `startIndex` `count` 如果 `count` 大于0，则搜索从开始，到从减号 + 1 开始向后终止。The is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` minus `count` plus 1, if `count` is greater than 0. 使用方法将元素与指定的值进行比较 。The elements are compared to the specified value using the method. 如果元素类型是用户定义的) 类型的 nonintrinsic (，则 `Equals` 使用该类型的实现。If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 `count` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的所有三个泛型重载 。The following code example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the method. 创建一个字符串数组，其中有一个条目出现在索引位置0和索引位置5。An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5. 方法重载从末尾搜索整个数组，并查找字符串的第二个匹配项。The method overload searches the entire array from the end, and finds the second occurrence of the string. 方法重载用于从索引位置3开始向后搜索数组，并继续到数组的开头，并查找字符串的第一个匹配项。The method overload is used to search the array backward beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the beginning of the array, and finds the first occurrence of the string. 最后， 方法重载用于搜索由四个条目组成的范围，从索引位置4开始，扩展向后 (，也就是说，它在位置4、3、2和 1) 搜索项; 此搜索将返回-1，因为该范围中没有搜索字符串的实例。Finally, the method overload is used to search a range of four entries, beginning at index location 4 and extending backward (that is, it searches the items at locations 4, 3, 2, and 1); this search returns -1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range. span.span: The type of the elements of the array.

param.name: array
param.span: 要调整大小的一维数组，该数组从零开始；如果为 ，则新建具有指定大小的数组。

param.name: newSize

span.span: The size of the new array.

summary.span: 将一维数组的元素数更改为指定的新大小。

span.span: Changes the number of elements of a one-dimensional array to the specified new size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法分配一个具有指定大小的新数组，将元素从旧数组复制到新数组，然后将旧数组替换为新数组。This method allocates a new array with the specified size, copies elements from the old array to the new one, and then replaces the old array with the new one. `array` 必须为一维数组。`array` must be a one-dimensional array. 如果 `array` 为 `null` ，则此方法将创建一个具有指定大小的新数组。If `array` is `null`, this method creates a new array with the specified size. 如果 `newSize` 大于 旧数组的，则分配一个新数组，并将所有元素从旧数组复制到新数组。If `newSize` is greater than the of the old array, a new array is allocated and all the elements are copied from the old array to the new one. 如果 `newSize` 小于 旧数组的，则分配一个新数组，并将元素从旧数组复制到新数组，直到填充新数组; 旧数组中的其余元素将被忽略。If `newSize` is less than the of the old array, a new array is allocated and elements are copied from the old array to the new one until the new one is filled; the rest of the elements in the old array are ignored. 如果 `newSize` 等于 旧数组的，则此方法不执行任何操作。If `newSize` is equal to the of the old array, this method does nothing. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 `newSize` 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `newSize`. 方法只调整一维数组的大小。The method resizes a one-dimensional array only. 类不包含用于调整多维数组大小的方法。The class does not include a method for resizing multi-dimensional arrays. 为此，你必须提供自己的代码或在第三方库中调用专用方法。To do this, you must either provide your own code or call a special-purpose method in a third-party library. 下面的代码演示了一种可能的实现，该方法用于调整 *n* 维数组的大小。The following code illustrates one possible implementation for a method that resizes an array of *n* dimensions. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Resize/CS/resizexd.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Resize/VB/resizexd.vb" id="Snippet2"::: ## Examples 下面的示例演示调整大小如何影响数组。The following example shows how resizing affects the array. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Resize/CPP/System.Array.Resize.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Resize/CS/arrayresize.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Resize/VB/arrayresize.vb" id="Snippet1":::
